decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The application for the demolition of first floor extension and erection of a new first floor extension to rear, retention of a roof terrace, internal refurbishments and landscaping of rear garden, as shown on drawing numbers 0227(PL)02 (Rev A), 0227(PL)03 (Rev A), 0227(PL)07 (Rev A) & 0227(PL)08 (Rev A), received 07 November 2006; 0227(PL)01 (Rev B) & 0227(PL)05 (Rev B), received 18 January 2007; and 0227(PL)04 (Rev C), & 0227(PL)06 (Rev C), received 09 February 2007, would not harm the architectural or historic character or the setting of the listed building and would preserve the appearance and character of Bedford Park Conservation Area. Therefore the proposed development complies with the relevant London Borough of Hounslow Unitary Development Plan 2003 policies; ENV-B.1.1 New Development, ENV-B.2.2 Conservation Areas, ENV.B.2.7 Alterations to Listed Buildings and Buildings of Local Townscape Character and H.6.4 Extensions and Alterations, and the Supplementary Planning Guidance.
Condition : 2 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - All new internal and external works, including works of making good, shall match the original work in both type, colour and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution.
description: Demolition of first floor extension and erection of a new first floor extension to rear, retention of a roof terrace, internal refurbishments and landscaping of rear garden (Listed Building Application)
